<center>[![logo](http://clients.reversehosts.com/xmas.png)](http://reversehosts.com) </center> 
   
Hey guys,  
My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you some special discounts on our OpenVZ VPS line in San Diego. These VPSs will be hosted with Calihop in San Diego, CA. We have been around since September of 2012 and are always working on improving our services. These VPSs use OpenVZ and SolusVM.   
  
Nodes are protected by either software or hardware RAID10, depending on the node you're provisioned on.
  
_Test IPs:_    
San Diego, CA: 67.207.208.210  
    
   
**`OPENVZ VPS`**  
   
**VPS 256**   
  
30GB Disk Space  
1 TB Bandwidth  
256MB RAM  
512MB Burst   
4 vCPU Cores      
1 IPv4 Address    
100Mbps Port    
OpenVZ/SolusVM  
**PROMOCODE: LET256ANNUAL**  

Order Now:   
$12/year - [San Diego, CA](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=65)

100GB Disk Space

100Mbps Port  
OpenVZ/SolusVM
